Package com.peyrona.mingle.network.socket

Class SocketServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.lang.japi.ListenerWise<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer.IListener>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer
    public final class SocketServer
extends BaseServer4IP
    The Server functionality is divided into two classes using the Strategy Pattern and Factory Pattern design principles: SocketServer (Factory/Facade): Acts as a public facade that decides which implementation to use (Plain or SSL).
    Author:
    francisco Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle
